lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed beyond belief. Redeemed by my savior Jesus Christ. It is in His name I would like to offer a cold cup of water to others. Drink deeply and be refreshed.
lender.occupational_info: Therefore, go and make disciples of all the nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and the Son and the Holy Spirit. - Matthew 28:19

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with resources that I can share with others
lender.occupational_info: I make sure my company's financial statements are prepared according to federal and state laws

lender.name: Mike R Schuster
lender.loan_because: I was inspired by Jessica Jackley at the Willow Creek Leadership Summit. I'm excited to see how my money can make a difference...
lender.occupational_info: I am a worship leader / singer / songwriter / recording artist

lender.name: claide
lender.loan_because: i need more income for my child's future!!!!!!
lender.occupational_info: buy & sell well do a lot of hard wok and patients!

lender.name: Troy
lender.loan_because: People don't need belief in God, Heaven, Hell or other supernatural phenomena to see that improving all human wellbeing is worthwhile and meaningful.
lender.occupational_info: I'm still a student, so can't loan much right now, but that should change in the coming years.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I can help people by lending what I have, and the money I do have will make a much larger impact on people attached to the kiva program than it could ever impact me.
lender.occupational_info: University Student in Australia - Studying Chemical Engineering (to do with designing and building plants/factories which make physical products)

lender.name: Neal
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering people with dreams, aspirations, energy and a strong work ethic.
lender.occupational_info: I work with an organization that helps serve more than 1 million children in poverty in 26 countries. For nearly 60 years, we have been using holistic child development, child by child, in order to release these children from poverty in Jesus' name.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I loan because I want to help people who need some extra money to start their business. I have loaned to two people who are wanting to buy motorcycles because I am interested in bikes too and love to ride our 50 and 80cc bikes.
lender.occupational_info: I roll up newspapers and deliver them to different houses.

lender.name: Chantal
lender.loan_because: I want to support women.
lender.occupational_info: I am an epidemiologist, which means I study the causes and distributions of diseases. I help companies who make medicines using the latest biotechnology.

lender.name: Honu
lender.loan_because: A small amount to me can mean alot to others. The best way to help people is with a hand up, not a handout.
lender.occupational_info: I remove unexploded ordnance that remains from military activities such as training and war.

lender.name: anthony
lender.loan_because: i want to make a difference. i ask god for that ability all the time..unfortunately i dont have much to give but i ope that what i have will be enough...
lender.occupational_info: action oriented...live serve love and have fun doing it....follow ur heart and what god has in store for u..blessings are million...they are all around us.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: In the grand scheme of things, does Starbucks really need my money that badly?
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher of the Arts to elementary school children; Music, Drama, and Visual Arts.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I'm learning about the world.

lender.name: Sam Su
lender.loan_because: I know we could make a difference to the world by helping those who are in nned

lender.name: Johnny L
lender.loan_because: It's a simple and very effective way to help entrepreneurs and their communities.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I would like to do my bit to improve the world! I want to help out people similar to me (ie single, 30-40 years, entrepreneur, retail or computerskills)
lender.occupational_info: I'm a specialist in everything which is related to webtechnology

lender.name: Scott & Ann
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference by helping businesses throughout the world
lender.occupational_info: Scott is a Pastor of a church he started from scratch in Green Bay, Wisconsin. Ann is a school teacher.

lender.name: Kristi
lender.loan_because: I believe that people are precious to God and this is a practical way for me to help care for someone dear to his heart.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I'm working full-time as a caregiver for my grandmother who is 85 and suffers from Parkinson's Disease. She lives in my home with me so I can help her with the tasks of every day life: bathing, dressing, feeding, etc. Our life together is both challening and humorous--but it's definitely a privilege to have the opportunity to serve her.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I believe in the dignity of people working to earn a living and provide for their family.
lender.occupational_info: I am one of the pastors of a church.

lender.name: Rudy Priambodo
lender.loan_because: I was born to be usefull for someone else by doing something and I believe " I only can do and God will do the rest"
lender.occupational_info: My job is always helping someone else to get the benefit by the product they bought...because I am pride to be salesman...

lender.name: Nan
lender.loan_because: "For unto whomsoever much is given, of him shall be much required: and to whom men have committed much, of him they will ask the more. " Luke 12:48 KJV
lender.occupational_info: My "work" is to proclaim Jesus Christ to the world.

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: I love people and I love the world. I want to make sure that there are people who are trying to make it on their own get a hand up! It is what God wants us to do.
lender.occupational_info: I conduct International Leadership training and development as well as conflict resolution work.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I have the ability to help others and LOVE seeing others succeed!! I lost my husband 3 years ago and so many people reached out to me. I want to "pay it forward" and know that that is what God wants all man kind to do- help each other! Good luck with your businesses and may God smile upon you everyday!
lender.occupational_info: I teach in the public school system of my community. I teach biology and anatomy/physiology. I love working with teenagers and seeing the ability of young people.

lender.name: Blair & Ann
lender.loan_because: The Lord has provided the needs for me and my family and I want to share some of our resources helping others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of the building and property of our church.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: It enpowers entrepreneurs in developing countries to be self supporting. How great is it that I can affect a life from here!

lender.name: Kristy
lender.loan_because: Its a great way to help others get ahead.
lender.occupational_info: Self employed, real estate agent. I list and sell homes in Halifax NS

lender.name: Bil
lender.loan_because: I want to help others realize their ideas and to help the world succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked as a graphic designer in the past and am going back to school for a new direction.

lender.name: Anitta
lender.loan_because: All you need is love.
lender.occupational_info: I study screen writing. I also do some journalistic work.

lender.name: Marycarol
lender.loan_because: a little bit of cash could make a huge difference in the lives of individuals.
lender.occupational_info: I care for my family, but I also am very active in doing the Lord's work. I co-direct a music and arts day camp, teach leadership to teens, and actively minister in a summer basketball ministry. I work parttime at a dessert stand and sometimes I substitute teach at our local elementary school which enables me to have the funds to loan.

lender.name: Bethany
lender.loan_because: We all have been given gifts. I believe we should always seek to use our gifts, and be looking to improve our minds, bodies, and souls.

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: It is such a novel way to help others. I love the stories of individuals overcoming obstacles.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the business aspects of a local church - finances, personnel, facilties, and our Christian School

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I am interested in micro lending as a tool for economic development. I like the concept of re-using the loans to continue to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I make loans and provide banking services to small businesses.

lender.name: Gretchen
lender.loan_because: Serving in third world countries has fueled my desire to give hope to the less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: My world rocks when I can be of service to others.

lender.name: Hunter
lender.loan_because: Its an opportunity to help others who are working hard and just need some support.

lender.name: Harry
lender.loan_because: I believe this site is a Brilliant Idea and inspired by a Higher Power. Doing God's Work just "floats my boat"
lender.occupational_info: I specialize in doing the one main thing that determines the success or failure in business -- and that's place media.

lender.name: William M
lender.loan_because: I care about world poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I teach High School Earth-Space Science and Meteorology.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in need. I think as a Christian, it is the right thing to do. People have helped me in my life and I want to return the favor.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children of Elementary School age. I have taught in public schools and schools in Sydney, Aust.; Okinawa, Japan, Taegu, S. Korea, and Addis Ababa, Ethiopia as well as in my home state of Colorado. I enjoy helping children learn about life, subjects and to be kind to one another and be part of the society of people.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: We have so much when so many individuals in the world have so little.
lender.occupational_info: I read alot of contracts every day and decide how they impact a major company's financial records.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me.

lender.name: Micah and Rachel
lender.occupation: Him: Adjunct Philosophy Prof. Her: Spanish Teacher
lender.loan_because: of the realization that what is good is never abstract, but always concrete. Although it's a nice idea, very few of us can change the world as such; a single droplet of water in an ocean can rarely make a wave. But for many of us, the great mistake of our existence is that, upon this realization, we then fail to act for the changes that are within our grasp. A single droplet, while not being able to move an ocean, does have the power to create a pulse of ripples in a small pond, each of which can bring new life to once stagnant water.
lender.occupational_info: Micah works for a company that helps create university level textbooks for all academic subjects. He is also a part-time philosophy professor and writer. Rachel is a secondary school Spanish teacher and sings professionally in an accomplished choral society.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: All things belong to God and He has given some to me that He expects me to share with those who do not have.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the development of cellular network products.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I care and want to help others who want to help themselves.

lender.name: Kim McClellan
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I photograph people, places, cultures, events around the world.

lender.name: Rob

lender.occupational_info: I manage and look after a medium sized (27,000 sq. m.) University Campus.

lender.occupational_info: We're Christian missionaries to the United States.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I am able to lend and the borrowers need loans to work and make their lives better - Lending this way makes me happy.
lender.occupational_info: I work with banks and lending in the USA. I'd really rather be lending in developing countries, so that is what I am doing in this small way.

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I want to help individuals succeed so as to be able to be self supporting and give their families the security of shelter and food
lender.occupational_info: I teach the gospel of Jesus Christ and help those who need counsel to help them get back onto a path that will help them discover their full potential through Christ.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Believe in the Christian ideal of helping others.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I am thrilled to begin being a part of assisting people with the vision, desire, and courage to make their own way.
lender.occupational_info: I assist low-income individuals in learning job readiness skills and then helping them become employed and self-sufficient.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I love to invest in others so they can provide for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to have a personal and intimate relationship with God.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: Jesus Christ calls us to love our neighbors.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to make things more efficient and to solve problems in a manufacturing facility.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I attended the Leadership Conference hosted by Willow Creek Church in Chicago (Bill HYbels). One of the speakers told about this organization. I felt compelled to do this to help people who need so little when I have so much in comparision.
lender.occupational_info: I teach in a community college. I teach mostly women who are usually single parents and are displaced workers due to the poor economy. Some of my students are also trying to improve their financial situations for their families like so many of these that I read about who need loans.

lender.name: Maribeth
lender.loan_because: I like to reach out and offer help to others around the world. I am enriched through these connections.
lender.occupational_info: Working in a busy Healthcare clinic

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: The opportunity to help underwrite and fund a loan for someone who has a need somewhere in the world is a privilege. It is inspiring to have a name, face and bio of another person to connect with.

lender.name: ajeng
lender.loan_because: I have to run my clothing sale store
lender.occupational_info: I distribute clothes to some stores and also sale it door to door

lender.name: Randy and Liza
lender.loan_because: We loan because we believe that helping others help themselves is one of the highest forms of compassion. We were blessed with funding when we started our business, it is time to pay it forward...
lender.occupational_info: Randy is the CEO of a technology company that makes education software for Elementary and Secondary schools. The product is distributed worldwide.

lender.name: kevin
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me. I want to bless others.
lender.occupational_info: I repair and remodel houses, and I produce videos which document and communicate what God is doing through people in the church.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I believe in others and their ideas.
lender.occupational_info: Recruit, train, maintian and sustain adult mentors for one-on-one relationships with at-risk youth.

lender.name: aeiriuhnn
lender.loan_because: I have been loaned to.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I believe in this company and this way of lending - not "giving." I appreciate people working for what they dream of. From that work comes pride and success.
lender.occupational_info: I currently work construction doing mostly electrical work, but I tend to dabble in all aspects including carpentry, HVAC, and plumbing. I am enrolled in an online college studying to achieve my Bachelors Degree in Psychology.

lender.name: Dave and Debbie
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the world. Everybody needs a chance to realize their dreams. This is too easy not to be involved in .

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I want to try and make a difference globally, even in a small way, Kiva has given me this chance.
lender.occupational_info: Difficult at times but so rewarding. My students are amazing!

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I am thankful for the opportunities I have living in Canada and I want to provide opportunities for others. Everyone with the determination to be an entrepreneur should have the resources they need to make it happen.
lender.occupational_info: My company helps internet businesses improve their websites so they attract more customers.

lender.name: Mowreader Family
lender.loan_because: We appreciate people who are trying to provide for themselves and we want to provide resources for those people to become successful.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a online retail company providing money to fund investments in growing the company. My wife is a children's pastor at a local church

lender.name: Anthony McLean
lender.loan_because: I heard about Kiva at this amazing conference called The Leadership Summit (http://www.willowcreek.com/events/leadership/2009/) I was blown away by the simple ingenuity of it all. I signed up as soon as I got home from the conference!

lender.name: Duane Cook
lender.loan_because: it helps people.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies become competitive by electronically connection with each other through websites, EDI, exchanges, etc.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to make a difference in the life of another human being, however small it may be.

lender.name: Tyrone
lender.occupational_info: I preach and teach about the love of God and the gift of salvation through Jesus Christ.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a way to support their family.
lender.occupational_info: I am a youth pastor to junior and senior kids at our church.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I am a Christian.
lender.occupational_info: I work with ex-felons in the United States.

lender.name: Adrian
lender.occupational_info: Looking for new ways to make a difference.

lender.name: Cary
lender.loan_because: I believe that generosity is a blessing. I am blessed by the generosity of others. So, I want to be that blessing too.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I have a passion for people with ideas and courage.
lender.occupational_info: I am a pastor, professor, traveler

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I receive.
lender.occupational_info: I write stories, write for websites, and teach people how to get their business websites to show up on the internet when people search.

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me, I want to bless others.

lender.name: Rusty
lender.loan_because: Jesus calls us to care for the less fortunate.

lender.name: Desiree
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me and I want to be a blessing to others.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Kenyon
lender.loan_because: God has been good to my family and I, and I was greatly moved by Jessica Jackley's presentation at the Leadership Summit.
lender.occupational_info: I teach drumming and music to college students in the United States (and part of my expertise is in "World Music" from places like Ghana, Brazil, Trinidad, etc!)

lender.name: Sonnygll
lender.loan_because: I care about about people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I troubleshoot, repair and maintain enterprise class servers running Unix or Linux. It's a technical, computer related sort of job.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: Christ has blessed me with enough to meet my needs, and I want to help others experience the blessings of shared resources.
lender.occupational_info: I have the pleasure of making music to glorify God and to bring enjoyment to others. I am studying to be a college professor of Music Theory.

lender.name: Evelyn
lender.loan_because: I have been looking for a way to support people in just this special way.
lender.occupational_info: I am the manager of a small ward in Nuclear Medicine. We treat patients using Radioisotopes

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I beleive God wants us to end poverty
lender.occupational_info: I lead an amazing community of people in our church family

lender.name: Joe & Jamie
lender.loan_because: I want to inspire hope and confidence in others.

lender.name: Brent and Nicole
lender.loan_because: People need help. God has given us opportunities, we just want people to have the same chance.

lender.name: Mitch & Daphne
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I appraise damage to automobiles after they've been involved in an accident.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a positive impact in the lives of others who are simply hoping to improve their lives through honest work.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the telecommunications industry

lender.name: Dan and Gail
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and help others.

lender.name: Bartholomew
lender.occupation: Helping my human play with computers.
lender.loan_because: My world is quite small, but through Kiva, I can help others everywhere live better lives.
lender.occupational_info: My human is an accountant & volunteer. She enjoys beading, reading, gardening. & playing with me & my sisters Tabitha & Gypsy.

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: "Freely you have received; freely give." - Jesus (Matthew 10:8)

lender.name: Rochelle
lender.loan_because: We are no longer an isolated economy. The global economy is the reality. To help others is my mission.
lender.occupational_info: I assist our older adults get the servies they need to live full lives.

lender.name: jose luis
lender.loan_because: Poder Ayudar a los que mas lo Necesitan
lender.occupational_info: soy agente de viajes

lender.name: Leif T Aanensen
lender.loan_because: Micro-financing is a great way to help people with good business ideas. If you have the capital to spare, it's just nice to put it into the value creation in other parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the public sector with privacy issues.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: I found this concept intriguing. I want to help, but can't do much. This was achievable for me.
lender.occupational_info: Adecco is the world's largest employment firm and helps people find jobs or change careers. My role is to find companies to hire the people we represent.

lender.name: Sevan
lender.loan_because: I am seeking harmony all around the world

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I like to share and give a hand to everyone who's in need.
lender.occupational_info: administration @ logistics/import agent in Rotterdam the mainport of Europe.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I have in the past needed just small amounts of money to make a difference to my life so I can relate to how a small loan can really assist someone to go on to achieve what they want in life.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a health service, managing and providing information training and support to clinical and non-clinical employees.

lender.name: greg
lender.loan_because: we all have been so blessed and it so good to see how we can share this with others

lender.name: Nic Osterberg
lender.loan_because: helping others is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I build the basic infrastructure that delivers electricity to homes and businesses in the United States.

lender.name: Christina
lender.occupational_info: I am part of an organization (Wycliffe Bible Translators) that helps translate the Bible into the heart languages of the minority people groups of the world. There are still 2400 language groups without God's Word, mainly because there aren't enough people to do the job, so I'm working as a recruiter, inviting people to join in the transformational work God is doing around the world through Bible translation!

lender.name: Jeannie
lender.loan_because: All of us need help from time to time and I believe Kiva's approach alleviates poverty with dignity while providing hope for the future...all of our futures.
lender.occupational_info: I help my church spend donations wisely and with good record keeping so we can be the hands and feet of Jesus Christ to each other, to our community and to the world.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: We should help each other. I may need help one day too.
lender.occupational_info: I like to make things with my hands and mind.

lender.name: John & Lois
lender.loan_because: It is just so good to give.
lender.occupational_info: I sharpen scissors for people in beauty salons and all over the U.S.

lender.name: Alan and Elle
lender.loan_because: Loaning through Kiva is a fantastic way to just give people a break... It's sustainable - and in real terms costs us nothing or very little to be able to offer real help, to real people, to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Web design and Internet marketing.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: it's an incredibly easy way to give people the chance that they deserve.
lender.occupational_info: I am a structural engineer. I design bridges on the highway system.

lender.name: Wes
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: Jeffray & Abby
lender.loan_because: We need to fund innovation for a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I work to make healthcare safe, high quality and affordable. We help people make better health choices and coach all involved in healthcare to get better outcomes.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is a proven method for helping people change their circumstances in a prudent and sustainable way. Kiva is a well-organized and reputable organization helping to close a gap that I would not be able to close on my own.
lender.occupational_info: I provide management and technical services to companies that need help in specific areas of information technology. (Basically, I work with computers and the people who use them.)

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help someone who's smart and hard working realize his or her dream

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I want to make an impact in the war against poverty and injustice
lender.occupational_info: I help people across the globe to implement and follow processes that will improve the business

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: We all need a start or restart in life, usually when we are most vulnerable. If a loan can make this happen and I can be part of a system that doesn't exploit 'vulnerability' then I am proud and happy to loan and enthusiastic to help.
lender.occupational_info: I teach teachers and educate others about 'planet friendly' technologies

lender.name: patricia
lender.loan_because: It is a joy, and privilege to share and to benefit others.
lender.occupational_info: providing spiritual and emotional care to patients and their families

lender.name: Felix
lender.loan_because: My wife and I feel a calling to help those around the world. To assist men and women to support their families by the hard work that they do. Microlending is that avenue, together we can help those that no lending institution could. Its not about investing for a financial return, its about investing in lives, in people!
lender.occupational_info: I work for an insurance company that provides medical insurance for low income families.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I was born on a very fortunate end of the spectrum
lender.occupational_info: Our company cleans up hazardous waste spills

lender.name: Blake and Jane
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone succeed!

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Corynn
lender.loan_because: We are all human.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurs to develop their business because I think that's the best way to do it and to be involved.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: this is a great opportunity to help others improve the quality of their life

lender.name: Joe C
lender.loan_because: I want to help other entrepreneurs have a chance to succeed in business and in life.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: My teenage son and I learned about KIVA at The Leadership Summit, and decided to get involved.
lender.occupational_info: My son is a very bright student who is a geography bee winner and I am an entrepreneur selling electronic components. We live in Florida.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: it is a privilege to be part of a world wide community and to share the blessings God has given our family
lender.occupational_info: I work with selling flowering plants to people in the US and Canada.

lender.name: Randy
lender.loan_because: it is a pathway to economic viability with persons in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: Economic visionary

lender.name: Alycia
lender.loan_because: I love enabling people to use their gifts and talents to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help lawyers and professionals re-think how they build relationships so they can sell, lead and grow their businesses better.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: I would like to provide someone with the same opportunities that have been provided to me. Their efforts are inspiring!

lender.name: Doug & Maria
lender.loan_because: Jesus said he cared about those who were in need, and he told his followers to as well, so here we are!

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: I think Micro-Finance should be one of the corner-stones in a new sustainable development framework.
lender.occupational_info: I'm part of a team that audits the financial statements of corporations.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I love people and want to help do may part to end world hunger. I have also been to a bank and been told no to a loan that I truly needed.
lender.occupational_info: I pastor a Christian and Missionary Alliance Church in Battle Lake, MN.

lender.name: Elinor
lender.loan_because: To celebrate the dignity, respect and admiration I have for entrepreneurial spirit aimed mainly at women who have children.
lender.occupational_info: I coach teach and direct performers in interpreting and presenting songs on the stage. I am a deaconess at my Church through which we offer mercy, care, spiritual encouragement and financial helps to those in our Church who find themselves in dire circumstances.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I believe in you. You are worth the risk.
lender.occupational_info: I listen carefully to people and I pay special attention to their hopes and concerns about their relationships, including but not limited to their relationship with God. Then I try to communicate from my experience and heart in ways that support them in their journey.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I love to help people because so many people have helped me. I pray that the money I loan will bless the receiver in many ways.
lender.occupational_info: I am a commercial real estate developer.

lender.name: Fran
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky to have so much and want to give back and help those with initiative and a good idea.
lender.occupational_info: I write lessons to teach people in businesses in the United States things they need know in order to do their jobs better (i.e. how to use a computer system)

lender.name: Russel
lender.loan_because: I've been helped out by many people over the years in getting my studio business going. I want to help others get their dreams off of the ground.
lender.occupational_info: I work full time at a church making sure that our church services are the best that they can be. When I'm not doing that I've got a side business helping people record music.

lender.name: Myles Arwine
lender.loan_because: I being an entrepreneur myself know how great it feels to be given a chance to do something you really love and truly believe in. It's never a good feeling being turned down.
lender.occupational_info: The work I do is allowing organizations, everyday people, charities, companies, etc... communicate and connect to help stop poverty, hunger, HIV/AIDS, death, and many other problems throughout the world. I run Equal Works which is a networking/community website that allows people to view charity updates, get information on events, and also get help connect services with services.

lender.name: Bubbles_and_Petey
lender.loan_because: Through the kindness of our family and friends who donated on behalf of our wedding, we have established our new KIVA page!

lender.name: Crystal
lender.loan_because: I desire to make difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am the director of a service-based youth camp. I am married and teach high school Government and US History.

lender.name: Gaurav
lender.loan_because: I think this is the single most effective and easiest way to give back to the world.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I believe in capitalism because it provides opportunity for those who want to pursue their dreams.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I prefer to help people fish for themselves over just giving people a handout.
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: Timbers Community Church
lender.loan_because: We attempt to follow Christ's example.
lender.occupational_info: We beleive in the transforming love of Christ.

lender.name: Wes & Loretta
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate enough to be in a position to assist others.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowerment, and I hope that my small contribution will help to empower enterprising entrepreneurs around the world.

lender.name: Faith Racers Ministry
lender.loan_because: To empower people to better their family and community.
lender.occupational_info: Faith Racers is a motocross (motorcycle) ministry spreading the love of Jesus at races and camps. We also use the popularity of motocross in the U.S. to raise public awareness and money for those in need.

lender.name: Alfons
lender.loan_because: I would like people to grow and to develop and to foster new business opportunities.

lender.name: SharpeningShack
lender.loan_because: As a small business owner in California, I know what it takes to make a business successful. I always said once my businesses are successful, I would start helping others. And Kiva offers me a way to spread charity by offering a helping hand and not a handout.
lender.occupational_info: The Sharpening Shack offers Knife, Garden Tool, Hand Tool and Sporting Goods "Old Fashioned Hand & Stone Sharpening" along with machine sharpening services. We offer pick-up and delivery service, call today to schedule a pick-up!

lender.name: Dawn
lender.occupation: Mom teaching my kids to care

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed by my own small business and I want to help bless others.
lender.occupational_info: fabulous crochet hats and accessories, designed and handmade by me

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can. And if you can help others, you should.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: I'm an anthropologist who has worked in Honduras for over a decade. I know firsthand that giving small amounts to individuals in these economies makes a difference!
lender.occupational_info: I teach students in college and universities about different cultures, about what it means to be human, and about our past.

lender.name: Vali
lender.loan_because: Because I have been fortunate in my life - I have food, shelter and other comforts. It is a wonderul opportunity to give through an organization like Kiva
lender.occupational_info: II have a background in Mathematics & Psychology. I have worked as a management trainer, Organization Development Consultant and latterly as a mathematics teacher. Author of ' Speed Mathematics using the Vedic System' and presently writing a book on psychological techniques that don't work and clinically proven techniques that do work..

lender.name: Bennett
lender.loan_because: what does my GOD require of me? To act justly and to love mercy and to walk humbly with my God.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Medical Intensive Care Unit Nurse.

lender.name: Matthew Warren
lender.loan_because: God's love in my life inspires me to love others by giving them a hand up.
lender.occupational_info: I am called to lead and inspire a faith community to reach her redemptive potential for the glory of Jesus Christ.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: I have resources to share with others

lender.name: Noah
lender.occupational_info: I help nonprofits and social businesses leverage brand building principles and practices to accelerate social change.
